snippet: During a campaign appearance, President Nicolas Sarkozy threatened to pull France out of the European Union’s open-borders accord unless protections against illegal immigration were strengthened.
abstract: French Pres Nicolas Sarkozy, trailing in opinion polls six weeks before presidential election, threatens to pull France out of the European Union’s open-borders accord unless protections against illegal immigration are strengthened.

byline.contributor: Maïa de la Baume contributed reporting from Villepinte, France.

lead_paragraph: During a campaign appearance, President Nicolas Sarkozy threatened to pull France out of the European Union’s open-borders accord unless protections against illegal immigration were strengthened.

headline.main: Sarkozy, in Rousing Talk, Takes Conservative Stands
headline.print_headline: Sarkozy, in Rousing Talk, Takes Conservative Stands
